text.data-name: A Front-end Angular Developer is a skilled professional specializing in creating user interfaces and interactive web applications using Angular, a popular JavaScript framework. They are experts in translating design concepts into functional and visually a
text.tspan: A Front-end Angular Developer is a skilled professional specializing in creating user interfaces and interactive web applications using
Angular, a popular JavaScript framework. They are experts in translating design concepts into functional and visually appealing web
experiences. Their responsibilities include writing clean, efficient code, optimizing application performance, and ensuring seamless
